message.content:
cs.IT, cs.NI, cs.SY, cs.MM, cs.CE

Reasoning: 
1. cs.IT (Information Theory) - The paper proposes an energy-efficient beamforming scheme with one-bit feedback, which involves information transmission and processing. 
2. cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture) - The proposed scheme is designed for ad hoc sensor networks, which falls under the scope of networking and internet architecture. 
3. cs.SY (Systems and Control) - The paper discusses the use of a relay node selection vector to opportunistically select a subset of relay nodes, which can be seen as a control system. 
4. cs.MM (Multimedia) - The paper mentions transmitting a common message over independent Rayleigh fading channels, which can be related to multimedia transmission. 
5. cs.CE (Computational Engineering, Finance, and Science) - The paper proposes low-complexity sub-optimal relay node selection rules, which involves computational engineering.
